page.title: 15BUCKLAND CHURCH DARTMOOR
page.content: The church of St.Peter is in the parish of St.Andrew's Ashburton. There is no vicar at present,the last one having retired to Bovey Tracey. The new one comes from his post as chaplain at Wakefield prison in October. The church services are conducted at present by the team ministers from Ashburton. Holy Communion and Evensong are held on alternate weeks. Congregations of about eight to ten local people attend, swelled by visitors in the summer. Visitors are a major source of finance for the upkeep of the church.Candidates for Confirmation go to Ashburton. Parochial fees are as follows: Marriage:Publication of Banns Â£4. Service Â£31. Funeral service and burial Â£33. Baptism Â£2.
